check-email.message-1: Almost there, please check your email. You should receive a confirmation link.
check-email.message-2: By clicking the link from your email, you can complete your registration and validate your account.

toast-message.success-logged-in: You have been logged in successfully

description.password-updated: Password updated! You can now log in.

cancelled.title: Login cancelled
cancelled.description: You can try again with the same method or use your email and password.

failed.title: Authentication error
failed.description: There was a problem with authentication. Try again or use another method.

temporary.title: Service unavailable
temporary.description: The service is temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.

invalid.title: Invalid request
invalid.description: The request is invalid. Please try again.

unexpected.title: Unexpected error
unexpected.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

generic.title: Authentication error
generic.description: Try again or use your email and password.

email-change.title: Email Change Confirmation

instructions.step1: Step 1: Check your current email ({email}) and confirm the change.
instructions.step2: Step 2: Now check your new email ({email}) and confirm to complete the change.
instructions.completed: Completed! Your email has been updated successfully.

email-change.auto-refresh: The page updates automatically every 3 seconds
email-change.email-must-be-different: The new email must be different from the current one
email-change.change-in-progress: ⚠️ There is a change in progress
email-change.complete-current-process: Complete the current process before starting a new one.
email-change.email-updated-successfully: Your email has been updated successfully. You can start a new change if necessary.
email-change.security-description: For security, confirm your current password. We will send verification emails to both addresses.

email-status.updated-successfully: Email updated successfully! You can now use {email}
email-status.last-step: Last step: Check your new email ({email}) and confirm to complete the change.
email-status.change-in-progress: Email change in progress: Confirm from your current email ({email}) to continue.

password-change.security-description: For security, confirm your current password before changing it.

new-order.title: New order
new-order.description: Create a new order to start selling!

share-store.store-live: Your store "{storeName}" is live and ready for customers.
share-store.share-instructions: Share this link on social media, send it to customers, or add it to your business cards.

toast.copy-failed: Failed to copy URL to clipboard

create-product.title: Create new product
create-product.popup-description: Select a store and create a new product to start selling!
create-product.click-browse: Or click to browse (max 1 file, up to 2MB)

configure-operations.title: Configure Store Operations
configure-operations.description: Set up delivery, business hours, and payment methods for your store.
configure-operations.payment-required: At least one payment method is required

step-1.title: Step 1
step-1.to-continue: To get started selling like a pro, you need to create a new store. This will give you your storefront, a place to list your products, and a place to manage your orders.

step-2.title: Step 2
step-2.to-continue: Once created, your products will be visible to customers and ready for sale. You can add images, descriptions, pricing, and inventory tracking.
step-2.first-complete: Complete Step 1 first to unlock this feature

step-3.title: Step 3
step-3.to-continue: Set up delivery options, business hours, payment methods, and operational settings for your store.
step-3.first-complete: Complete previous steps to unlock this feature

step-4.title: Step 4
step-4.share-your-store-with: Share your store's link with your customers to start selling!
step-4.first-complete: Complete previous steps to unlock this feature

help.title: Need help?
help.description: Our experts are here to help you.

dialog.title: Contact us
dialog.description: Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
dialog.name: Name

error.page-not-founded: The page you are looking for does not exist.

hero.just_released: Last update: Enhanced customization and new components

following.rocket: Lanzate makes it easy to sell
following.mobile: Outage problems? Use it in your phone!
following.barcode: Benefit from our USB Barcode Scanner!

description.slogan: Manage your business has never been easier. Focus on growth while we give you full control

centralize.title: Comfort
centralize.description: Work from anywhere, anytime, with any device.

sell.title: Customize
sell.description: Get your custom domain and store with your name.

ship-easily.title: Accessibility
ship-easily.description: Access your store from any device, anytime, with any internet connection.

plan.title: Pricing
plan.description: Choose the plan that fits your business and start simplifying your online management with Lánzate. Scale as you grow, with all the tools you need in one place.

benefits.1: Up to 1 free store and branch

benefits.2: Up to 3 stores and 3 branches each store

benefits.3: Up to 10 stores and 10 branches each store

customization.title: Customize your store
customization.description: If you want to customize your store beyond what we offer, please contact us!

store-selector.title: Select Store
store-selector.description: Choose a store to create a new order

search.placeholder: Search by name, description or SKU...

cart.title: Cart
cart.empty-description: Scan or search products to add

product-results.title: Search Results
product-results.try-again: Try again with different search terms
product-results.search-instruction: Search products by name or scan a barcode

messages.change-calculation:
Total to charge: ${total}
How much did the customer pay?

calculate-change.title: Calculate Change
calculate-change.payment-amount-placeholder: Enter the amount the customer paid

finalize-sale.title: Finalize Sale
finalize-sale.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to finalize this sale?
finalize-sale.info-message: Toggle the switch above to confirm and finalize the sale

quick-actions.title: Quick Actions
quick-actions.description: Here you can find the most important actions for your store together with some quick links to get you started.

create-store.title: Create new store
create-store.description: Create a new store to start selling your products! Choose a name for your store and click on the button below, you can continue to add more details of the store once it's created.
create-store.name: Name

account-tab.name: Name
account-tab.delete-warning: You can delete your store by clicking the button below.
account-tab.delete-irreversible: Keep in mind that this action is irreversible and it will delete all the data associated with your store.

edit-store.title: Edit store
edit-store.description: Edit the details of your store
edit-store.name: Name
edit-store.edit-social-media-description: Update your store's social media links
edit-store.social-media-updated-error: Failed to update social media links

delete-store.title: Delete Store
delete-store.description: You can delete your store by clicking the button below. Keep in mind that this action is irreversible and it will delete all the data associated with your store.

update-prices.title: Update prices
update-prices.description: Update your product prices in bulk
update-prices.no-selection-disclaimer: No products selected. Select products from the table or choose a category to update prices in bulk.

edit-operational-settings.title: Edit operational settings
edit-operational-settings.description: Configure your store's delivery options and payment methods
edit-operational-settings.free-delivery-minimum-placeholder: Leave empty if you don't want free delivery

create-branch.title: Create new branch
create-branch.description: Create a new branch to start selling your products! Choose a name for your branch and click on the button below, you can continue to add more details of the branch once it's created.
create-branch.name: Name

edit-branch.title: Edit branch
edit-branch.description-popup: Edit the branch details including name, address, phone, and email. You can also designate this branch as the main branch.
edit-branch.name: Name
edit-branch.main-branch-note: This will be the primary branch for the store. All other branches will be unset as main.

delete-branch.title: Delete Branch
delete-branch.description: Are you sure you want to delete this branch? This action is irreversible. Orders associated with this branch will be preserved but the branch reference will be removed.

create-employee.title: Add employee
create-employee.description: Search for a registered user to add them as an employee of this store.

messages.select-user-first: You must select a user first
messages.user-already-employee: This user is already an employee of this store
messages.searching-description: This may take a few seconds

edit-employee.title: Edit employee
edit-employee.description: Edit the employee's role, permissions and other details. Note: Email and name cannot be changed as they belong to the user account.
edit-employee.name: Name:
edit-employee.email-name-note: Note: Email and name cannot be edited here as they are part of the user's account

delete-employee.title: Delete Employee
delete-employee.description: Are you sure you want to delete this employee? This action is irreversible. Orders created by this employee will be preserved but the employee reference will be removed.

change-order-status.title: Change Order Status
change-order-status.payment-marked-paid: Payment will be automatically marked as PAID
change-order-status.payment-explanation: Changing from PENDING to {status} indicates the order has been paid. The payment status will be updated accordingly.
change-order-status.confirm-payment: I confirm this order has been paid
change-order-status.stock-restore-warning: This will restore product stock and reverse store balance
change-order-status.understand-consequences: I understand the consequences of cancelling this order
change-order-status.no-changes-warning: The selected status is the same as the current status. No changes will be made.

descriptions.cancel: Cancelling this order will restore product stock and reverse the store balance.
descriptions.from-pending: Changing from PENDING status will mark the order as paid and update payment records.
descriptions.default: Update the order status to reflect its current state.

cancel-order.title: Cancel Order
cancel-order.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this order? This will restore product stock and reverse the store balance. This action cannot be undone.

distribute-stock.title: Redistribute Stock
distribute-stock.error-exceeds-stock: Total redistribution cannot exceed available stock

create-product.title: Create new product
create-product.popup-description: ¡Seleccioná una tienda y creá un nuevo producto para comenzar a vender!
create-product.click-browse: Or click to browse (max 1 files, up to 2MB each)
create-product.name: Name

edit-product.title: Edit product
edit-product.click-browse: Or click to browse (max 1 files, up to 2MB each)
edit-product.name: Name

delete-product.title: Delete Product
delete-product.description: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action is irreversible.

delete-variant.title: Delete Variant
delete-variant.description: Are you sure you want to delete this variant? This action is irreversible.

delivery-information.title: Delivery Information
delivery-information.description: Choose how your order gets to you

payment-information.title: Payment Information
payment-information.description: Choose how you want to pay

bank-transfer.title: Bank Transfer Details:
bank-transfer.instructions: Please include your order number in the transfer description. Your order will be confirmed once the payment is received.

mercado-pago.title: Mercado Pago Payment
mercado-pago.description: When you click "Confirm Order", you will be redirected to Mercado Pago to complete your payment securely. After payment, you will be brought back to our site with your order confirmation.

sections.helpDesc: If you need help, contact us
